#summary opcodes for floaitng point instructions

=== Floating Point Instructions ===

==== FADD ====
Template opcode:
{{{
0000 000000 1110 xxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx 001010
}}}

Instruction Usage:
{{{
FADD Rxx, Rxx, (-)Rxx/(-)c[0xa][0xb]/F(-)123.123/0xabcd;
}}}
If the third operand is a floating point number, it will be a 32-bit floaitng point number with the last 12 bits truncated.

==== FSETP ====
Instruction usage:
{{{
FSETP.comparator(.logical op) p (,|p), register, regitser/constant memory/20-bit immediate (,opp)
}}}
For what p, |p and opp mean, please refer to the setp instruction section in the ptx manual.
